observations.notes: Failed once on 2025-12-09, did not recur on 2025-12-10 and later. Likely timing or data initialization issue.
Failed 2025-12-10 and 2025-12-11 with 'sendUserFeedbackButton not enabled'. Resolved 2025-12-12. Likely backend timing or Monday slowness.

Failed 2025-12-10 (app crash due to threading), fixed in commit 768e54411. Failed again 2025-12-11 with 'License expired! not exist'. Resolved 2025-12-12. Threading fix successful, banner display issue was transient.
Failed once 2025-12-11 with connection lost error. Likely simulator instability. Did not recur.
Failed once 2025-12-11 with 'Exports NavigationBar not exist'. Likely navigation timing. Did not recur.
Failed once 2025-12-11 with XCTAssertTrue failure (unclear assertion). Did not recur.

Microsoft Entra ID introduced new Passkey setup web page dialog. Attempted fix in openspec/changes/archive/2025-12-15-fix-uitest-sso-passkey-handling/ by adding handlePasskeyWebPageIfNeeded() to handle 'Setting up your passkey...' page. Test appeared passing on 2025-12-15, but FAILED AGAIN on 2025-12-16. Fix was only temporary - Microsoft continues changing auth flow. Moved back to active observation with multi-account rotation strategy.

'Smart privacy switch' StaticText not found on 2025-12-15. Likely network connectivity issue during test execution. Did not recur on 2025-12-16. Confirmed as transient.
